definition: to admit defeat/to give in/to acknowledge a mistake/to apologize/to be amenable to persuasion

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: After a ruinous strike, the union caved in.
sentences.chinese: 一場破壞性的罷工之後，工會突然服軟了。

sentences.english: It is said that many people are serving hard against soft.
sentences.chinese: 這是說，許多人都是服硬不服軟的。

sentences.english: Your clothes, more than any promise, it tells me that you love me so much.
sentences.chinese: 你的服軟，勝過任何諾言，它告訴我，你是如此愛我。

sentences.english: One more shot, G falls down reluctantly.
sentences.chinese: 海蒂很酷地補一槍，朱很不情願倒下服軟。

sentences.english: We can not be soft with evil forces.
sentences.chinese: 對於惡勢力，我們不能服軟。
